professional_summary: Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle database management, backup strategies, disaster recovery, and performance tuning. Seeking advancement in IT career towards management roles.

key_responsibilities: Manage Oracle Database tickets for supported clients.
Ensure client database systems meet security and functional design requirements.
Monitor client database environments and troubleshoot issues using Big Brother
Oversee lower Tiers in Database Operations Center and handle escalations for complex Oracle database issues.
Perform Junior Oracle DBA tasks and complete Oracle DBA training for promotion.
